result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph T Brandsma was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
$443 costs to be paid in the first year, remaining costs paid in final year. Defendant to complete domestic abuse counseling, not possess firearms. 

Contact as allowed in 12CF573 amended bond: no contact with Ms. Brandsma,defendant may go to children's public events, not to go to children after the event is over unless under placement time.

Filed by court reporter Cathy Braunschweig, Aug. 18, 2014 Plea and Sentencing.
filed by Atty. Edward J. Hunt
filed by Atty. Edward J. Hunt

Defendant Joseph T Brandsma in court with attorney Edward J. Hunt.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant plead no contest to count 1 in 12CF573.   Deferred Prosecution Agreement accepted, case held open 24 mos. for compliance.  In 13CF446 & 14CF28, Defendant plead no contest to 3 cts. misdemeanor bailjumping as amended. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence: 2 yr. probation, $443 costs x 3, pay $443 costs in first year, remaining costs paid in final year, complete domestic abuse counseling, not possess firearms, contact as allowed in 12CF573 bond, 30 days jail, huber, to be used at agent's discretion. In 13CF446 ct. 2 read in and dismissed. Ct. 1 in 14CF28 read in and dismissed.  Court granted 4  jail credit in 12CF573 No jail credit in other cases. Case called 2 p.m., adjourned 2:30 p.m.
